src:
Trans Papua Ruas Jayapura-Wamena Tersambung Maret 2020
05 Nov 2019, 11:10 by Eduardo Simorangkir


Foto: Pool/BP Jalan Nasional XVII Papua Barat.

Jakarta - Pengerjaan jalan Trans Papua saat ini masih terus dikerjakan. Wakil Menteri PUPR John Wempi Wetipo mengatakan salah satu ruas yang tengah dikerjakan adalah Jayapura-Wamena sepanjang 580 km.Dia bilang, ruas tersebut saat ini sebenarnya sudah terbuka. Namun pembangunan jembatan dan pengaspalan ruas jalan yang belum selesai ditargetkan rampung pada Maret 2020 mendatang."Ini yang sementara dikerjakan 580 km menghubungkan Jayapura dengan Wamena. Kemudian ke Pantai Selatan dari Wamena Yaguru Mumugu sedang proses pengerjaan," katanya saat ditemui di Hotel Mercure Ancol, Jakarta, Selasa (5/11/2019).Ruas jalan tersebut sebelumnya juga disinggung oleh Presiden Jokowi saat bertandang ke Papua beberapa waktu lalu. Kabarnya, ruas yang seharusnya bisa digunakan secara penuh pada akhir 2019 tersebut harus tertunda lantaran pengerjaan jembatan putus masih dilakukan."Menurut informasi dari Kepala Balai di Jayapura, paling lambat Maret tahun depan bisa dilalui kendaraan tembus sampai ke Wamena. Itu akan membantu membuka isolasi di wilayah pegunungan tengah Papua," kata Wempi.Dibukanya ruas Jalan Trans Papua Jayapura ke Wamena diharapkan membuka keterisolasian daerah pegunungan Tengah Papua. Akhirnya, denyut ekonomi daerah setempat bisa semakin dipacu dengan turunnya harga-harga lewat terciptanya konektivitas. "Dengan dibukanya akses jalan akan semakin menurunkan biaya bahan baku sehingga memacu semangat masyarakat," kata Wempi.Simak Video "Dear Pak Jokowi, Jalan Trans Papua Rusak Parah"[Gambas:Video 20detik](eds/zlf)
text:
Papua Trans Jayapura Jayapura-Wamena Section Connected in March 2020
05 Nov 2019, 11:10 by Eduardo Simorangkir


Photo: Pool / BP XVII West Papua National Road.

Jakarta - Work on the Trans Papua road is still ongoing. Deputy Minister of PUPR John Wempi Wetipo said one of the sections being worked on was Jayapura-Wamena along the 580 km. He said, the section was actually open at the moment. However, the construction of bridges and asphalting of unfinished road segments is targeted to be completed in March 2020. "This is being done while 580 km connects Jayapura with Wamena. Then to the South Coast of Wamena Yaguru Mumugu is under construction," he said when met at the Mercure Ancol Hotel, Jakarta, Tuesday (11/05/2019). President Jokowi also mentioned the road when he visited Papua some time ago. Reportedly, the section that should have been able to be fully utilized by the end of 2019 had to be delayed because the construction of the broken bridge was still being carried out. the central mountain region of Papua, "said Wempi. The opening of the Trans Papua Jayapura to Wamena Road section is expected to open isolation from the central mountains of Papua. Finally, the economic pulse of the local area can be further spurred by falling prices through the creation of connectivity. "With the opening of the access road will further reduce the cost of raw materials so as to spur the spirit of the community," said Wempi. Watch Video "Dear Pak Jokowi, the Trans Papua Road is Damaged Severely" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds]
